title: Recollections of an Old Soldier. The Life of Captain David Perry
description: The autobiography of David Perry, soldier in the French and Indian War and the American Revolution. Mr. Perry served in several different military units throughout his career as a soldier, one being Rodger's Rangers. Mr. Perry discusses some of the tactics employed, battles he engaged in, several near death incidents and then speaks eloquently about the future of his new country that he and his fellow soldier's struggles brought about.
author: David B. Perry
